channel.title: Books on rirsc
channel.description: Recent content in Books on rirsc

item.title: Clásicas y oscuras
item.description: Clásicas y oscuras↗ is such an incredibly cool website with a collection of female characters in literature, cinema and music.

item.title: Buch der tage
item.description:
By chance, I discovered the bookshop langer blomqvist, which is full of discounted and second-hand books. I bought the gem Buch der Tage, by Patti Smith. It consists of a daily photo with a small description covering 2018.

Its in German, so I decided it could be cool to force me to read and translate the accordance day. Today, 12 of June, says as follows: ‘Lighted candles in memory of the deceases at the Abbey of Saint-Germain-des-Près´.

item.title: ZineFest at Subaermarkt
item.description:
I visited for the first time this sweet fest at Subaemarkt where artists and illustrators show and sell their gems.

This is my loot; a magazine, some cool illustrations and toon of stickers. I will definetily keep an eye on it for further editions.
